Job.Description: She will work in a soup kitchen.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to work during the ${shift} shift.

Messages.Message:
She must be perfect at this.
Today ${name} was managing the kitchen giving orders to other cooks and checking the quality of their work.
${name} was helping in the kitchen. Her task was to stir-fry vegetables. One word: Perfection. Food that she prepared was great!
Being done with the main dish earlier, ${name} decided to bake cookies for desert!
Excellent dish! Some world class chefs should learn from ${name}!
${name} knife skill is impressive. She's cutting precisely and really fast, almost like a machine.

She's unbelievable at this and is always getting praised by people for her work.
${name} is in charge of the cooking for several weeks now. You could swear that the population of rodents and small animals in the area went down.
While preparing for today's cooking, ${name} noticed that one of the crucial ingredients is missing. She manage to change the menu and fully use available ingredients.
She speedily served all in line at the food counter. All the portions handed out were equal.
Preparing something new she mixed up the proportions from the recipe. The outcome tasted great!
${name} was helping in the kitchen. Her task was to prepare the souse for today's meatballs. The texture and flavor was top notch.

She's good at this job and gets praised by people often. While cooking she used everything that was in the kitchen. Nothing was wasted. While cooking she accidentally sneezed into the pot. Luckily nobody saw that. "${name} was helping in the kitchen. Her task was to carve the meat. Smile on her face that appear while doing this, was somehow scary and disturbing. ${name} was doing the dishes. Most of them "survived" and will be used next time. She spent her shift at the food counter without any trouble.

She made a few mistakes but overall she is okay at this. Her cooking isn't very good. But You probably would risk serving the prepared dish to a dog. Today she was assign as the cook. Not being able to focus on the task at hand, she overcooked the pasta. She served all in line at the food counter. Some portions were smaller than others. ${name} was helping in the kitchen. Her task was to make a salad. She manage to do this much. When walking with a pile of clean dished she slipped and fall. All the plates got broken.

She was nervous and made a few mistakes. She isn't that good at this. Today she was assign as the cook. Meatballs that she prepared could be used as lethal projectiles. ${name} was doing the dishes. Let's say it would be a lot quicker to throw them all right away, then wait for her to break so many during this simple chore.
While cooking she burned two brand new pots!
${name} was helping in the kitchen. Her task was to dice the carrots. Surely the carrots were cut, but to called them diced would be an exaggeration.
Just wanting to serve the food fast to end her shift. She did a sloppy job at the food counter.

She was nervous and constantly making mistakes. She really isn't very good at this job. While preparing ingredients for the soup she almost cut off her hand!
${name} was helping in the kitchen. Her task was to peel the potatoes. The peels were thick and had a lot of the vegetable left on them. What a waste!
Today she was assigned as the cook. The thing that she created hardly could be called food.
Today she was assigned to work at the food counter. While handing out food she served different portions to people in line.
Being assigned to the food counter, she put a sign "self serving" and went out.
